remarks: The topologies over a given base set form a Moore collection: the intersection of any family of them is a topology, including the empty (relative) intersection which gives the discrete topology ~ distop . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.)
statement: toponmre $p |- ( B e. V -> ( TopOn ` B ) e. ( Moore ` ~P B ) ) $.
